message:
Dear {{ doc.employee_name }},

Your compensatory leave request submitted for the period from {{ doc.work_from_date }} to {{ doc.work_end_date }} has been {{ doc.workflow_state }} by your Reporting Manager.

Request Details:
- Leave Type: {{ doc.leave_type }}
- Status: {{ doc.workflow_state }}
- Link of Request: View Request

If you have any questions, please contact your Reporting Manager.

Thank you,
HR System
name: Leave Request Response By Reporting Manager
subject: Compensatory Leave Request {{ doc.workflow_state }} by Reporting Manager
